title: Firefighter Safety Training
description: Comprehensive safety training covering personal protective equipment, scene safety, and emergency procedures.
additional: CEU credits available. Lunch provided. Bring your own PPE.

title: Leadership Development Workshop
location: Illinois Fire Chiefs Association, Springfield, IL
description: Develop essential leadership skills for fire service professionals. Topics include team building, communication, and decision-making.
additional: Open to all ranks. Networking lunch included.

title: Monthly FSWI Meeting
description: Monthly membership meeting to discuss upcoming events, training opportunities, and organizational updates.
additional: Zoom link will be sent to members 24 hours before the meeting.

title: Emergency Medical Response Training
description: Advanced emergency medical response training with hands-on practice and certification renewal.
additional: Current EMT certification required. CEU credits provided.

title: Women in Fire Service Conference
description: Annual conference celebrating women in the fire service with keynote speakers, workshops, and networking opportunities.
additional: Early bird registration available until February 15th. Hotel discounts available.

title: Physical Fitness Workshop
description: Workshop focused on maintaining physical fitness standards and preparing for CPAT testing.

title: Fire Investigation Training
location: Illinois State Fire Marshal Office, Springfield, IL
description: Advanced fire investigation techniques and evidence collection procedures for fire service professionals.
additional: Prerequisites: Basic fire investigation course. CEU credits available.

title: Spring Networking Event
description: Spring networking event for FSWI members and supporters. Connect with fellow fire service professionals.
additional: Light refreshments provided. RSVP required by April 5th.

title: Hazmat Response Training
location: Illinois Emergency Management Agency, Springfield, IL
description: Hazardous materials response training with hands-on exercises and equipment familiarization.
additional: PPE provided. Lunch included. Limited to 20 participants.

title: Mental Health Awareness Workshop
description: Mental health awareness and stress management workshop specifically designed for fire service professionals.
additional: Free for FSWI members. Registration required. CEU credits available.
